comprehensive_overview: SRA Toolkit is a collection of tools and libraries for accessing the Sequence Read Archive (SRA) and related genomic data formats. It provides command-line utilities for downloading, browsing, and converting high-throughput sequencing data stored in the SRA database maintained by the National Center for Biotechnology Information (NCBI).
core_features: Download high-throughput sequencing data from the SRA database
Convert data between different file formats (e.g., SRA to FASTQ)
Query metadata and access sequence read data efficiently
